column4: Can anyone help? i have an old version of ubuntu live cd... doing a quick fsck on a hard drive and it just prings "fsck 1.40  wip 14-nov-2006) i'm trying sudo fsck sda2. did sudo fdisk =l to check the drive letters and its the right one. Can also access it from "my computer"
sorry i'm not really that much in tune with linux
what is the file type of the drive? ext3? ext4?
